page.title: 01Newcomers to Lower Beeding
page.content: Mrs Conley moved to Lower Beeding in March 1985 from Crawley.She wanted to move here because she wanted a bigger garden and because she liked the country side.The people she has met so far are very nice. Mrs Conley has three children,Deborah aged 11,Claire aged 8 and Neil aged 5.Her husband owns a travel business but does not work locally.Mrs Conley does not work.Mrs Conley only does some shopping in Lower Beeding.For her there are enough shops and they do sell enough.Mrs Conley only goes to the shops if she forgets something.The two older children go to school in Crawley.Mrs Conley found it difficult to get to know people in the village.She thought an imformation leaflet about organisations in Lower Beeding would have been useful.h
